Package com.badlogic.gdx.graphics

Interface Summary
GL10 Interface wrapping all standard OpenGL ES 1.0 methods.
GL11 Interface wrapping all OpenGL ES 1.1 methods.
GL20 Interface wrapping all the methods of OpenGL ES 2.0
GLCommon This interface defines methods common to GL10, GL11 and GL20.
Pixmap A Pixmap represents a platform specific bitmap.
Texture A Texture wraps a standard OpenGL ES texture.
TextureData Loads image data for a texture.
 

Class Summary
BitmapFont Renders bitmap fonts.
BitmapFont.TextBounds  
BitmapFontCache Caches glyph geometry for a BitmapFont, providing a fast way to render static text.
Color A color class, holding the r, g, b and alpha component as floats in the range [0,1].
ImmediateModeRenderer An ImmediateModeRenderer allows you to perform immediate mode rendering as you were accustomed to in your desktop OpenGL environment.
Mesh A Mesh holds vertices composed of attributes specified by a VertexAttributes instance.
ModelLoader A class for loading various model formats such as Wavefront OBJ.
OrthographicCamera An orthographic camera having a position and a scale value for zooming.
PerspectiveCamera A perspective camera, having a position, a direction an up vector, a near plane, a far plane and a field of view.
Sprite Holds the geometry, color, and texture information for drawing 2D sprites using SpriteBatch.
SpriteBatch A SpriteBatch is used to draw 2D rectangles that reference a texture (region).
SpriteCache Draws 2D images, optimized for geometry that does not change.
SpriteSheet Loads images from texture atlases created by SpriteSheetPacker.

A SpriteSheet must be disposed to free up the resources consumed by the backing textures.
SpriteSheet.PackedSprite A sprite that provides additional information about the packed image it represents.
TextureAtlas A TextureAtlas is composed of a single Texture and named TextureRegions.
TextureRegion A TextureRegion defines a rectangular area in a texture given in pixels.
VertexAttribute A single vertex attribute defined by its VertexAttributes.Usage, its number of components and its shader alias.
VertexAttributes Instances of this class specify the vertex attributes of a mesh.
 

Enum Summary
BitmapFont.HAlignment  
Mesh.VertexDataType  
OrthographicCamera.Side  
Pixmap.Format Different pixel formats.
Texture.TextureFilter Texture filter enum
Texture.TextureWrap Texture wrap enum
